description: Identifies when a Point-to-site VPN is Modified or Deleted. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Point-to-site VPN being modified or deleted may be performed by a system administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Point-to-site VPN modified or deleted from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: Azure Point-to-site VPN Modified or Deleted
